with pytest.raises(BadArgsException):
    request_handler = RequestHandler('a', 'b', 'https://localhost',
        'default', 10, 30)
    mocker.patch.object(requests.Session, 'send', return_value=
        ExampleResponse(400))
    mocker.patch.object(request_handler,
        '_RequestHandler__create_err_message', return_value='Failed')
    request_handler.make_request('get', '')
